Youchoose is an environment that allows you to experience a different recommendation system. What you need to see new content is a browser extension, available for Chrome and Firefox. Algorithms are opinionated too, especially when they try to boost ads revenues.

Browser extension for
Youtube viewers

03 Jan 2022 By Tracking Exposed

A browser extension is a small software module for customizing a web browser. Browsers typically allow a variety of extensions, including user interface modifications, cookie management, ad blocking, and the custom scripting and styling of web pages.

Read more

Data Donation for activists and researchers

31 Dec 2021 By Tracking Exposed

When you enable Data Donation feature you agree to share with us the recommendations that YouTube shows to you, as well as the advertisements.

Read more

Studio for Content Creators

04 Jan 2021 By Tracking Exposed

If you are a Content Creator you may be wondering how to use our tools to recommend your audience exactly what you want. On the subdomain studio/youchoose.ai you can link your channel to our system by simply pasting your channel ID and publish in the channel description the token you have generated. After the system verifies that you own that channel, you can remove the token from your channel description.

Read more
